turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some movie recommendations. I'm in the mood for a good sci-fi film. Any suggestions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Based on your preference for sci-fi, I can recommend a few. How about 'Blade Runner 2049', 'Arrival', or 'Dune'? They're all critically acclaimed and well-regarded within the genre.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, I've seen Blade Runner 2049 and Dune already, and I really enjoyed them. Arrival sounds familiar though. What's it about, and is it anything like those two?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Arrival is a bit different, but it's fantastic! It focuses on a linguist hired by the military to communicate with aliens who have landed on Earth. It's more focused on character development and exploring themes of communication and time. It has a very similar thought-provoking feel, but a different visual style. I would rate it a 8.5/10. Would you like to hear a synopsis?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that sounds interesting. I think I'll add that to my watch list. But... I just remembered. I saw Arrival last month! Do you have any other recommendations? Maybe something a bit... less popular?
